title: WallFlower Women's Legendary Bootcut Mid-Rise Insta Stretch Juniors Jeans (Standard and Plus)
description: Be legendary - Bootcuts are back and better than ever. The Wallflower Legendary women's bootcut jeans come in our stretchiest ever Insta Stretch denim with outstanding recovery that keeps your jeans looking amazing all day. The premium feel and endless holding power will make these your new favorite women’s jeans.

Look fabulous - Get your cowboy boots ready! Long & lean with the perfect kick leg opening. These Walflower jeans for women sit low on waist, fitted through the knee with a flare to the ankles for a classic leg-lengthening silhouette: ready for any occasion.

All in the details - Classic front pocket styling and embellished back flap pockets to elevate your outfit. Maintain your cool and casual style whether you're on horseback or heading back to school. Complete your 90s, y2k, festival and everyday looks.
Get the perfect fit - Look and feel amazing, from size 0 to 24. Find straight size, mid size and plus size jeans, in 3 different inseam lengths. Made for Every Body. Period.

ECO Love - Join our journey to more eco-friendly processes for more sustainable garments. By 2026, we aim to source 50% of our cotton through the Better Cotton program—supporting water-efficient farming practices that benefit both farmers and the environment.
